name: grimoire
description: Grimoire is a self-hosted note-taking and wiki platform for medieval or fantasy-style digital journaling. It supports markdown, tagging, linking, and timelines through a storytelling-oriented interface.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Save and organize web bookmarks with tags, descriptions, and full-text search

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize bookmarks with flexible tagging system for easy retrieval

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Migrate bookmarks from browsers or other bookmark managers via standard formats

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your browsing history and bookmarks on your own infrastructure
